mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, username, userpassword, date_birth, grade_member, grade, question, answer) values( #{userid}, #{username}, #{userpassword}, #{date_birth}, ${grade_member}, ${grade}, #{question}, #{answer})
mapper.select: select userid, username, userpassword ,date_format(date_birth,'%y%m%d') date_birth , question, answer , grade_member, grade from member where userid=#{param1}
select count(userid) from member where userid=#{param1}
mapper.delete: delete from member where userid=#{param1} and userpassword=#{param2}
mapper.select: select userid from member where username=#{param1} and date_birth=#{param2}
select userid, userpassword from member where userid=#{param1} and question=#{param2} and answer=#{param3}
mapper.update: update member set userpassword=#{param2} where userid=#{param1}
mapper.select: select userid, userpassword, grade_member from member where userid=#{param1} and userpassword=#{param2} and grade_member=2
